item.title: [Delta] All Pickables - very easy to convert to other servers
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“FFkingdom, post:17, topic:437120”][quote author=my names luke link=topic=539834.msg3952468#msg3952468 date=1332403970]

Didn’t Nighel already release this?

Would surprise me a lot since I only wrote it just right now.
I actually wrote it on purpose after the [size=7pt]horrible[/size] one ffkingdom released
i don’t even know who nighel is

Awww lmfao it wasn’t that horrible lol…well maybe it was lmfao. Delta can be that from time to time lol

You’re blaming Delta_ on your own bad release?
[/quote]
Well, considering it was already there, and all I did was switch the x & y coords…yeah
I am not a weathered coder to Java. Only been doing it since around November. Still learning everything, how to shorten things, and make things work in different ways. Had the two pickable tuts not come along, I would have never known the way it is done in Delta is wrong. Therefor would only be able to assume that way was the right way.
I do not ask about the ways things are done for two reasons
1 - I’ll never learn anything
2 - Answers are rarely given
I completely get the pickable. Makes perfect sense. 4 months ago, I would not have gotten it at all. So someone who is just beginning who would not understand this much, would at least know from mine that something all be it wrong, is there they can utilize, until they learn more. Then by all means yes get rid of it lmfao.[/quote]
So you release a tut of something that was already there where you just did some adjustments… bad you
and it was kinda horrible since you worked with abs coords to define spots with pickables.

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] All Pickables - very easy to convert to other servers

item.title: [Delta] All Pickables - very easy to convert to other servers
item.dc:creator: @FFkingdom FFkingdom
item.description:
@FFkingdom wrote:

[quote=“my names luke, post:16, topic:437120”][quote author=FFkingdom link=topic=539834.msg3952337#msg3952337 date=1332386405]

Didn’t Nighel already release this?

Would surprise me a lot since I only wrote it just right now.
I actually wrote it on purpose after the [size=7pt]horrible[/size] one ffkingdom released
i don’t even know who nighel is

Awww lmfao it wasn’t that horrible lol…well maybe it was lmfao. Delta can be that from time to time lol
[/quote]
You’re blaming Delta_ on your own bad release?[/quote]
Well, considering it was already there, and all I did was switch the x & y coords…yeah
I am not a weathered coder to Java. Only been doing it since around November. Still learning everything, how to shorten things, and make things work in different ways. Had the two pickable tuts not come along, I would have never known the way it is done in Delta is wrong. Therefor would only be able to assume that way was the right way.
I do not ask about the ways things are done for two reasons
1 - I’ll never learn anything
2 - Answers are rarely given
I completely get the pickable. Makes perfect sense. 4 months ago, I would not have gotten it at all. So someone who is just beginning who would not understand this much, would at least know from mine that something all be it wrong, is there they can utilize, until they learn more. Then by all means yes get rid of it lmfao.

item.title: [Delta] All Pickables - very easy to convert to other servers
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“lover854, post:13, topic:437120”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=539834.msg3952309#msg3952309 date=1332383830]

Didn’t Nighel already release this?

Would surprise me a lot since I only wrote it just right now.
I actually wrote it on purpose after the [size=7pt]horrible[/size] one ffkingdom released
i don’t even know who nighel is

lover854 is Nighel

Oh yes he did, but he used 1 method for every single pickabletype,
kinda bothered me

And about the task is have it but i was talking about other ppl, like pblord7 he uses eventmanager

Some use task some eventmanager, most even do use nothing of those.
It’s not a big deal to add the tasksystem to the server. Just like the eventmanager had to be added.
I’m forcing now one to use this tutorial, they always can use yours.

Maybe convert yours with eventmanager so it also only uses one method for all pickables if it bothers you so much?
[/quote]

Im happy with mine, nothing wrong with it works fine just the class is a bit bigger[/quote]

Never ever stop yourself from making improvements

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm

kinda bothered me
[/quote]

And about the task is have it but i was talking about other ppl, like pblord7 he uses eventmanager[/quote]
Some use task some eventmanager, most even do use nothing of those.
It’s not a big deal to add the tasksystem to the server. Just like the eventmanager had to be added.
I’m forcing now one to use this tutorial, they always can use yours.

Maybe convert yours with eventmanager so it also only uses one method for all pickables if it bothers you so much?
